Summary: Two UFOs over nearby power plant.
divs: sighting details two of us witness them one took pictures didnot tell anyone of my involvement until years later showed my kids where and what i saw many years later my one son came home from school with a paperback book on ufos it showed a dated picture that the other party had taken which was listed as of the photos by a professional that project blue book couldnot dipute and it showed exactly what i had told my kids unfotunetly he took the book back to school before i could copy info i would like to find that photo again for my kids please help tu *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez\cms) [yes,iam not a typest] i was on offical business[military] at the time and the other person pointed them out to me but later advised me to keep my mouth shut,it cost him! i aqlso was a professional and knew what i was seeing both objects just stayed hovering above the the power plant less than 1\8 mile away and aprox 100 ft above plant and its stacks they both appeared the same asaucer like objects with a partial dome on them which seemed to have a yellowish\white light or port on the dome the out4er edges of the saucer had\showed a changing light pattern that veried from blue to orange to red but in a drifting pattern life the old movie marquis used to do he apparentlt had time to get a camera ,take pictures and change film the gov took on of the but he latter tould that i soom day see the other as i explained i finally did iwent inside to get my camera too but when i came out they were gone my time observing the was apprx 3-5 mins his must have been much loner his name and rank and the date was noted in the photo
